Name: Samurai Sword Stage
About the game: Cool and simple samurai action game! Kill your enemies with stylish swordsmanship. Let's kill 100! Controls: Move Slash / Iai Avoid (Stamina is continuously consumed while inputting) Dash Sheath a sword Rules: Clear: 100 kills GameOver: Fail to avoid the enemy's attack twice. Stages: Summer: Tutorial Fall: Samurai enemies Winter: Ninja enemies Spring: Samurai and Ninja enemies Costumes: 8 costumes
